title: 1920s Dada fonts?
content:
I posted this image at the end of another thread I started and got no replies, so here it goes again:

Can someone suggest fonts that resemble the fonts seen in this Hannah Hoch collage?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020142726im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_3440.jpg)
author: c.gray

comments.content: I'm going to move this to the TYPE ID area.

I see some Playbill in there.

- Lex
well the DADA's did not use Helvetica.. that's for sure. :)
